name: Revelation (itch) (TaraTorp33do)
description:
It's been 10 long years since the people left the earth.

After 10 long years and we are the last humans from the Earth in this solar system.

People have lived in the spaceship that researchers had built before the new glacial period. It's the only place that people can live now. 

We have orbited the Earth 10 years and waited that we get some sign of life from the Earth. But nothing has appeared.

Until now...

-The game was made 48 hours for XGJ21-
